Dear allï¼Œ
We are joyful to announce that the 77th Anniversary of Hua-Shih Education College is comingâœ¨âœ¨âœ¨

In order to encourage Cross-cultural exchange and learning between international students and local students, weâ€™ve organized an event called â€œHalal Food Festivalâ€.ğŸ¥³

In this event, we are very excited to invite sisters from Southeast Asian immigrant families, migrant worker families, and international students in Hualien to become chefs together, bringing the taste of their hometown to everyone.

We sincerely invite you to participate in this â€œHalal Food Festivalâ€, and learn about the diverse cultures of Asia.

There are only 25 places available. Sign up now to reserve your spotğŸ“
